name: Slime Rush (MjtheDj1)
description:
In this 10 level 2d platformer game you run away from a variety of different slimes that try to stop you from escaping. Escape the slimes, get as many coins as you can, and beat the game in the shortest amount of time!

Controls:

Forward - D or Right Arrow Key

Backward - A or Left Arrow Key

Jump - Space or Up Arrow Key (You can jump higher if you hold down space or up arrow key.)

Pause/Unpause Game - ESC key

*This game may be updated in the future.*
